title: Fonts from eagle image
content:
I know some of the fonts from this image can you help me to know the font name that you know.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329013854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/26881-eagleview_3941.JPG)
author: artslons

comments.content:
This came up a long time ago, but since the thread author (you?) didn't use a nice title, it's lost in the mists of time.

"SOAR at EMS" is Univers. "EAGLEVIEW" is a free font called Varsity which has been squooshed.

I also see a free font based on the Blade Runner logo, Benguiat Roman, Benguiat Gothic, Aviano, ITC Bauhaus, And some grunge fonts that are probably free. Check dafont for those.

- Lex

@Lex Kominek  
Can you suggest me right title for this . I was really confused for this :(

Your title is fine, but I couldn't find the previous thread, so I'm guessing it left out the word "eagle". I was just asking if you posted it before.

- Lex
Lars, Mike and Steve were in [good mood](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329013854/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=268608) today.
